src_text: E ciù tante interpretaçioin do determinismo tecnològico condividdan doe idee generali: che o sviluppo da tecnologia o va apreuvo à un seu percorso a-o de là de l'influensa colturale e politica, e che a tecnologia de gio a gh'à di “effetti” in scê societæ che son inerenti, ciutòsto che socialmente condiçionæ.
ref_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
hyp_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: First, that the development of technology follows a unique pathway, beyond human control, determined by technological developments themselves rather than the various social concerns that may drive those technological developments; and second, that technology represents a field unto itself that develops independently of other influences, a field that neither casues nor is caused by social or political influences.

hyp_text: Italian is also the language used in everyday speech by most of those who work in the state, so much so that Latin is often used in religious ceremonies.
prompt:
[Ligurian]: À tutti i mòddi, tutti i belgi e i svisseri de lengua françeise an impreiso o françeise standard a-a scheua, e no avian di problemi à capîve ascì ben che deuviæ o scistema de numeraçion franseise standard.
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Ligurian]: Into corso di secoli e gente gh’an edificou con cua de fasce in sciô paisaggio aspio e rapido, fin a-e scuggee che s’avansan in sciô mâ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Ligurian]: 800 miggia do Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ean stæte serræ, apreuvo à unna perdia de miggiæa de barrî de petròlio grezzo, à sudde de Fairbanks, inte l'Alaska.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Ligurian]: De zöne che in giornâ forman parte do Belgio in tempo favan parte do Lussemburgo, ma son diventæ belghe apreuvo a-a rivoluçion belga di anni ’30 de l’Euttoçento.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Ligurian]: Fin da-o seu comenso, The Onion a l'é vegnua à ëse un vertadeo impëio da parodia do giornaliximo, con unn'ediçion à stampa, un scito web ch'o l'à attiou 5.000.000 vixitatoî sôo che into meise d'ötovie, personali ads, un network de notiçie à 24 oe, podcasts, e un atlante do mondo, stæto allansou che no l'é guæi, stæto ciammou Our Dumb World.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Ligurian]: Into corso di secoli e gente gh’an edificou con cua de fasce in sciô paisaggio aspio e rapido, fin a-e scuggee che s’avansan in sciô mâ.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Ligurian]: 800 miggia do Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ean stæte serræ, apreuvo à unna perdia de miggiæa de barrî de petròlio grezzo, à sudde de Fairbanks, inte l'Alaska.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Ligurian]: De zöne che in giornâ forman parte do Belgio in tempo favan parte do Lussemburgo, ma son diventæ belghe apreuvo a-a rivoluçion belga di anni ’30 de l’Euttoçento.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Ligurian]: Fin da-o seu comenso, The Onion a l'é vegnua à ëse un vertadeo impëio da parodia do giornaliximo, con unn'ediçion à stampa, un scito web ch'o l'à attiou 5.000.000 vixitatoî sôo che into meise d'ötovie, personali ads, un network de notiçie à 24 oe, podcasts, e un atlante do mondo, stæto allansou che no l'é guæi, stæto ciammou Our Dumb World.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
